parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of the extension line whose gap to get

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the document default value of the gap, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Gap value in system units; ignored if UseDoc is true

title: IDisplayDimension.SetWitnessLineGap
description: Sets the gap for the specified dimension extension line.
signature:
System.Boolean SetWitnessLineGap( 
   System.Int16
WitnessIndex
,
   System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   System.Double
Gap
)

parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of the extension line whose gap to get

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the document default value of the gap, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Gap value in system units; ignored if UseDoc is true

returns: True if the operation succeeds, false if not
remarks:
The UseDoc argument is dependent on the detailing standard. You can retrieve the document default value using the
document-level user-preference swDetailingWitnessLineGap
.
Call
IModelView::GraphicsRedraw
after calling this method to redraw the graphics area.

examples.title: Get and Set Dimension Extension Lines Gaps (VBA)
